title: Chogath pokemon battle
body:
A wild chogath appeared!

Chogath used rupture, it was super effective, you flinched!
Chogath used feral scream, it was super effective, you flinched!
Chogath used feast, it was supereffective, you fainted!

No counterplay. None at all.

replies.body:
>No counterplay. None at all.

Skill shots come with in built counterplay.

No counter play is Flash Annie tibbers stun, Cho has a bunch of in built counter play
Cho'gath is used, Use Vayne! It's super effective!

Chogath used rupture, you used side-step, Cho'Gath's attack missed.
Chogath used feral scream, you used banshee's veil, Cho'Gath's attack missed.
Chogath used feast, you used banshee's veil, Cho'Gath's attack missed.
but i just used the banshees veil, needs to recharge

I was gonna say exactly what all of these guys just said.

Also range makes Cho cry.
